item.title: hdfs9870error
item.description: #HADOOP启动hdfs网页（端口号9870）时出现Operation category READ is not supported in state standby. Visit https://s.apache.org/sbnn-error的解决方法。 hdfs haadmin -getServiceState nn1 standby hdfs haadmin -getServiceState nn2 standby hdfs haadmin -transitionToStandby –forcemanual nn2 hdfs haadmin -transitionToActive –forcemanual nn1 hdfs haadmin -getServiceState nn1 active hdfs haadmin -getServiceState nn2 standby
